title: Remove SEO keywords text from home page

requirements.summary: Remove the SEO keywords text block that appears below the 'Ready to Book Your Appointment?' section on the home page
acceptanceCriteria: The SEO keywords text block is completely removed from frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx
The section layout remains intact without visual gaps or layout shifts
No other content on the home page is affected by this change

file_operations.description: Remove the SEO keywords text block ('SEO Keywords: skin care clinic Kolkata • Dermatologist in Beleghata • Orthopedic clinic Kolkata • Pathkind lab partner Kolkata • Women's health clinic Kolkata') that appears below the 'Ready to Book Your Appointment?' section. Locate the text element containing this content and remove it entirely while preserving the surrounding layout structure.
